SDG_GOAL: Goal 3: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
SDG_TARGET: Target 3.6: By 2020, halve the number of global deaths and injuries from road traffic accidents
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 3.6.1: Death rate due to road traffic injuries
STAT_CONC_DEF:
Definition:

Death rate due to road traffic injuries is defined as the number of road traffic fatal injury deaths per 100,000 population. This is an absolute figure indicating the number of people who die as a result of a road traffic crash.
SOURCE_TYPE: Holistic Assessment of Health Sector Programme of Work
RATIONALE: Road traffic injuries remain an important public health problem, particularly for low-income and middle-income countries.
COVERAGE: There is no available disaggregation for this indicator.
